Constructor Detail

Model

public Model(java.lang.String newFirstName,
             java.lang.String newLastName,
             int newHeightInches,
             double newWeightPounds)
Constructor for setting travel and smoking

Parameters:
newFirstName - - sets first name of model
newLastName - - sets last name of model
newHeightInches - - sets height in inches for model
newWeightPounds - - sets weigth in pounds for model.
CanTravel - automatically set to true.
CanSmoke - automatically set to false.

Model

public Model(java.lang.String cFirstName,
             java.lang.String cLastName,
             int cHeightInches,
             double cWeightPounds,
             boolean cTravel,
             boolean cSmoke)
Constructors - Initialized Values

Parameters:
cFirstName - - sets first name of model
cLastName - - sets last name of model
cHeightInches - - sets height in inches for model
cWeightPounds - - sets weigth in pounds for model
cCanTravel - - sets if the model can or cannot travel (true or false)
cSmoke - - sets if the model smokes or does not (true of false)
